name: Past, Present, Future
description: Simple three-card reading for quick insight into your life's timeline

positions.label: Past
positions.description: Past influences that have shaped your current situation

positions.label: Present
positions.description: Your current situation and immediate circumstances

positions.label: Future
positions.description: Likely future outcome based on current path

instructions: Focus on a specific question or situation
Draw the first card for your past influences
Draw the second card for your present situation
Draw the third card for the likely future outcome
Consider how all three cards connect and tell a story

interpretation.overview: The Past-Present-Future spread offers a linear view of your situation, showing how past events influence your present and guide your future.
tips: Look for connections between the cards
Consider how the past card's energy flows into the present
Remember that the future card shows likely outcomes, not fixed destiny
Pay attention to the suit progression across the three cards
